message.raw: Change method of cd'ing into the unpacked source directory to avoid problems that can be caused by unlucky sorting of the tarball and its top-level directory (if the tarball file name comes first, then `cd $WORKSPACE/build/*` will try to cd to the tarball itself).  This new method isn't awesome, but it should be more robust than the previous one.
message.html: Change method of cd'ing into the unpacked source directory to avoid problems that can be caused by unlucky sorting of the tarball and its top-level directory (if the tarball file name comes first, then cd $WORKSPACE/build/* will try to cd to the tarball itself). This new method isn't awesome, but it should be more robust than the previous one.
